text: Tim Campbell MBE (born June 1977) is a British businessman and television personality best known as the first winner of the British version of The Apprentice.Transport manager wins Apprentice, BBC News, 4 May 2005 Upon winning the show, Campbell won a position in Alan Sugar's company Amstrad. He left in 2007, two years after he won the show. In 2022, Campbell returned to The Apprentice as one of Lord Sugar's aides. == References == Category:British businesspeople Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:British television personalities
title: Tim Campbell (businessman)
